Package controllers

Class EnquiryCTRL

java.lang.Object
controllers.EnquiryCTRL
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEnquiryResponse, IEnquirySubmission
public final class EnquiryCTRL extends Object implements IEnquiryResponse, IEnquirySubmission
Controller class for managing enquiries in the BTO system.

Handles creation, editing, deletion, and response to enquiries. Supports role-based enquiry menu navigation for applicants, officers, and managers. Implements both IEnquirySubmission and IEnquiryResponse interfaces.

    • runEnquiryMenu

      public void runEnquiryMenu(Scanner sc, UserCTRL userCTRL, BTOProjectCTRL projectCTRL, EnquiryView enquiryView, EnquiryCTRL enquiryCTRL)
      Runs the enquiry menu for the current user, displaying options and routing to the appropriate actions based on the user's role (applicant, officer, manager).
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input.
      userCTRL - The UserCTRL instance.
      projectCTRL - The BTOProjectCTRL instance.
      enquiryView - The EnquiryView for displaying menus and results.
      enquiryCTRL - This EnquiryCTRL instance.
